definition: a project of personal concern to someone, to treat with excessive indulgence
details:
noun
- a project of personal concern to someone
= example: a project of personal concern to someone
- a very young mammal
= example: a very young mammal
- (slang) sometimes used as a term of address for attractive young women
= synonyms: babe, sister
- the youngest member of a group (not necessarily young)
= example: the youngest member of a group (not necessarily young)
- a very young child (birth to 1 year) who has not yet begun to walk or talk
= example: a very young child (birth to 1 year) who has not yet begun to walk or talk
= synonyms: babe, infant
- an unborn child
- an immature childish person
= synonyms: child
verb
- to treat with excessive indulgence
= example: to treat with excessive indulgence
= synonyms: spoil, cocker, featherbed, mollycoddle, coddle, indulge, pamper, cosset
